title: The practice practised by the Pope and his prelates which they haue vsed synce they came to their estates.
author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.
publisher: By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holburne Conduit, and are to be solde by Hugh Syngleton at the sygne of Saynt Augustine in Poules church yarde,
notes: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
